body:
## Workflow status returns at the minimum empty response instead of json unmarshal error


## returns a json unmarshal error

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem 
query for workflow state and use query_type as __open_sessions
```
./tctl --ad 192.168.99.101:17233 --namespace domain_gd_sre5 workflow query -w cron_1368a257-25f0-4420-977a-9dc5457df664 -qt __open_sessions --qcl strong
Error: Unable to decode query result.
Error Details: payload item 0: unable to decode JSON: json: cannot unmarshal array into Go value of type string
('export TEMPORAL_CLI_SHOW_STACKS=1' to see stack traces)
[root@temporal-dev-a-admin-58c7d48747-9q65d /usr/local/bin] 


./tctl --ad <ip>:27233 --namespace folder-operations-experiment workflow query -w 7833599702 -qt getStats --qcl eventual
Error: Unable to decode query result.
Error Details: payload item 0: unable to decode JSON: json: cannot unmarshal object into Go value of type string
('export TEMPORAL_CLI_SHOW_STACKS=1' to see stack traces)
```
## Specifications

  - Version: 0.23.1
  - Platform: centOS
title: Temporal CLI querying workflow status.
